title: Sound disappears on and off on ex-verizon pixel2...
content:
Randomly, the sound totally disappears. It becomes impossible to hear when I receive a message or phone call, and I have no sound when I play music or radio.
Very occasionally the sound comes on but most of the time it is off.
I searched the internet and apply the usual solutions such as turning Bluetooth off, making sound sounds are enabled, etc., But I cannot resolve the issue.
